introduction: Completely unexpected, Isabelle Rombauts is appointed as CEO of the family business Rombauts Pharma, a major player in the international pharmaceutical market. She soon encounters the consequences of serious mismanagement by her father and brother. And she is faced with a devilish dilemma: should she follow her own conscience? Or the interests of her influential family? A drama series filled with intrigue, power struggles and despair in the world of big pharma.
